Name: Antigua and Barbuda
Geographic configuration: Two main islands (Antigua Island and Barbuda Island)

Name: Cuba
Geographic configuration: One main island, and several smaller islands (Isla de la Juventud, etc.)

Name: Cyprus
Geographic configuration: Part of a larger island, de jure sovereignty over entire island (Cyprus)

Name: Dominican Republic
Geographic configuration: Part of a larger island (Hispaniola), and several smaller islands (Alto Velo, Catalina, Saona, Beata, etc.)

Name: East Timor
Geographical location: Maritime Southeast Asia, Lesser Sunda Islands

Name: Grenada
Geographic configuration: One main island, two dependencies (Carriacou and Petite Martinique)

Name: Haiti
Geographic configuration: Part of a larger island (Hispaniola), and several smaller islands (Gonâve, Tortuga, Les Cayemites, etc.)

Name: Indonesia
Geographic configuration: Archipelago, including parts of larger islands (Borneo, New Guinea, Sebatik, and Timor)
Geographical location: Maritime Southeast Asia, Indian and Pacific oceans

Name: Ireland
Geographic configuration: Part of a larger island (Ireland), and several smaller islands

Name: Jamaica
Geographic configuration: One main island, and several small islands (Port Royal Cays, etc.)

Name: Malta
Geographic configuration: Two main islands (Malta Island and Gozo) plus other smaller islands

Name: New Zealand
Geographic configuration: Two main islands (North Island and South Island) plus other smaller islands

Name: Papua New Guinea
Geographic configuration: Part of a larger island (New Guinea), and several smaller islands

Name: Saint Kitts and Nevis
Geographic configuration: Two main islands (Saint Kitts Island and Nevis Island)

Name: São Tomé and Príncipe
Geographic configuration: Two main islands (São Tomé Island and Príncipe Island)
Geographical location: Atlantic Ocean, Gulf of Guinea, Africa

Name: Singapore
Geographic configuration: One main island, plus other smaller islands

Name: Sri Lanka
Geographic configuration: One main island, plus other small islands

Name: Trinidad and Tobago
Geographic configuration: Two main islands (Trinidad Island and Tobago Island) plus other smaller islands

Name: United Kingdom
Geographic configuration: One main island, part of second island (Ireland), plus several minor islands

Name: Taiwan
Geographic configuration: One main island, and several smaller islands
